title: Design an Avionics System Architecture
description: A systems engineer is designing the architecture for a new integrated avionics suite, including flight displays, flight management systems, and communication radios.

tasks.description: Define the functional requirements and interfaces for all avionics subsystems.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a complete requirements document.

tasks.description: Create a system architecture diagram showing how all the subsystems connect and exchange data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear and accurate architecture diagram.

tasks.description: Analyze the data bus loading to ensure the chosen architecture (e.g., ARINC 664) can handle the required data throughput.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs the analysis and confirms the data bus has sufficient capacity.
